name: Dox Rival
bots_text:
Immediately: place Rival token on this job.

Finish: Rival gains 2 Bottleneck

name: Rival Denial
bots_text: Rival gains CPU spike. This Job only ends when that rival has no CPU spikes.

name: Root Kit
bots_text: Command bots on asset. This does not count against your Job limits.

name: Move Laterally
bots_text:
START: Place an Action on this card.

FINISH: Place Action on top of your draw pile.

name: Trojan Horse
dev_text: Place a Waste Cycles on the discard of Rival

name: Kill Signal
dev_text: Target any player. Cancel one of their Jobs.

name: Reboot
quick_text: Remove all Debuffs. You may cancel any of your jobs for $1 each.

name: Refactor
quick_text: You may re-order your discard pile.
dev_text: You may re-order your draw pile.

name: Phishing Expedition
dev_text: Gain $5 at the start the next turn

name: Credential Dump
bots_text: After 3 :time:, access a server and gain a card

name: Server Logs
bots_text: Gain Secret from server, trash this card.

name: Input Validator
dev_text: If you are not overclocked, defeat this defense. Otherwise, this cannot be removed from your dev slot.

name: Buffer
dev_text: You may place an Action on this card.

name: Bot Herder Rival
quick_text: Applies to a Rival that has the most Bots.

name: Adjacent Rival
quick_text: Applies to Rival on your right or left
bots_text: Applies to a Rival you share a node with.

name: Reset Accounts
dev_text: The next rival action against you fails.
